query.statement:
SELECT A.MANDT AS MANDT , '' AS FLAG , A.DOCNO AS DOCNO , A.DOCKIND AS DOCKIND , A.APPGUBN AS APPGUBN , A.SEQNO AS SEQNO , A.SEQSTAT AS SEQSTAT , A.APDPT1 AS APDPT1 , A.APDPT1_N AS APDPT1_N , A.APNUM AS APNUM , A.APRNK AS APRNK , A.APIRUM AS APIRUM , A.APDATE AS APDATE , A.APTIM AS APTIM , A.APDESC AS APDESC , VALUE(C.ZSITE_NM,'') AS SPT , VALUE(C.POSID,'') AS PJT , (SELECT CASE MAX(GBU) WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' ELSE 'Çù·Â»ç' END FROM SAPHEE.ZCST111 WHERE MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND PJT = VALUE(C.POSID,'') AND HST <> 'D') GBU FROM SAPHEE.ZWBAP02 A LEFT OUTER JOIN SAPHEE.ZQMT007 B INNER JOIN SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 C ON C.MANDT = B.MANDT AND C.POSID = B.PSPID ON B.MANDT = A.MANDT AND B.JQPRNUM = A.DOCNO WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.DOCNO = #DOCNO# AND A.DOCKIND = #DOCKIND#
ORDER BY A.MANDT, A.DOCNO, A.DOCKIND, A.APPGUBN, A.SEQNO DESC FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
